mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.healthge_name as healthgeName ,a.healthge_photo as healthgePhoto ,a.healthge_types as healthgeTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.healthge_content as healthgeContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM healthge a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.healthge_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.healthgeName},'%')
and a.healthge_types = #{params.healthgeTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.healthge_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.healthgeContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
